ground_truth: they regained their apartment apparently without disturbing the household of gamewell

ground_truth: rest and be still until i warn you

ground_truth: they then renewed their journey and under the better light made a safe crossing of the stable roofs

transcription: young fitz-ooth had been commanded to his mother's chamber so soon as he had come out from his converse with the squire.

ground_truth: robin carefully descended the ladder and found himself soon upon firm rocky ground
transcription: robin carefully descended the ladder and found himself soon upon firm rocky ground.

ground_truth: cried he waving the lanthorn before him to make sure that these were no ghosts in front of him

ground_truth: as any in england i would say said gamewell proudly that is in his day

ground_truth: truly such a horse should be worth much in nottingham fair

ground_truth: enquired robin with his suspicions still upon him

ground_truth: if for a whim you beggar yourself i cannot stay you
